name: Frog Fling (mattdaly)
description:
Intense, tactical, frog-on-frog combat

Lead your horde to victory by collecting coins and summoning holographic frogs to fight by your side.

GAMEPLAY

  • click and drag on friendly frogs to fling them
    • right click and drag to select multiple frogs
  • fling yourself into enemy frogs to defeat them - whoever is travelling at a higher velocity wins the duel
  • fling yourself towards coins and holo-frogs to collect them
    • your tongue will grab items - but enemies can grab them too
    • collect six coins to win
    • collect holo-frogs to gain an extra frog
  • if all of your frogs are defeated, you will be forced to try again

A game by Matt Daly

Source available on GitHub
